credit_line: Gift of Joel and Anne Ehrenkranz
title: Desk
provenance: Suzanne Lipschutz/Second Hand Rose Gallery; Anne and Joel Ehrenkranz
medium: Lacquered wood, painted canvas, chromed metal
description: Blue rectilinear form composed of rectangular drawer and shelf unit on left, two-shelf unit on right, supporting two horizontal drawers immediately below desk top; drawer and shelf units with chromed mental supports, square in section; drawers with red conical knobs; desk top covered in blue-painted canvas.
name: Desk
